a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Reported cases of paralytic polio from wild polioviruses,
This includes reported cases of paralytic polio from any wild poliovirus strain (WPV1, WPV2, WPV3).
Note: The last case of WPV2 was reported in 1999, while the last case of WPV3 was reported in 2013. Cases shown since 2013 were
